parameters.text:
=CRITICAL SECURITY ALERT

Vulnerability: CVE-2025-55182 (React2Shell)
Severity: CRITICAL (CVSS 10.0)
Status: Actively Exploited by China-nexus APT groups

IMPACT:
â€¢ Unauthenticated Remote Code Execution
â€¢ Affects React Server Components
â€¢ Targets Next.js applications with App Router

AFFECTED SYSTEMS:
â€¢ React 19.x applications
â€¢ Next.js 15.x and 16.x with App Router enabled

RECOMMENDED ACTIONS:
1. IMMEDIATE: Upgrade React to patched version
2. Block external access to Next.js development servers
3. Deploy WAF rules blocking suspicious RSC requests
4. Audit Node.js processes for suspicious activity
5. Review logs for: whoami, id, uname commands

THREAT ACTORS:
â€¢ Earth Lamia (206.237.3.150)
â€¢ Jackpot Panda (45.77.33.136)

Contact: Security Operations Center
